searchUrl:
@js:
var html="<!DOCTYPE html>\n" +
    "<html lang=\"en\">\n" +
    "<head>\n" +
    "    <meta charset=\"UTF-8\">\n" +
    "    <title>Title</title>\n" +
    "</head>\n" +
    "<body>\n" +
    "\n" +
    "<form id=\"search\" action=\""+getDomain()+"/modules/article/search.php\" method=\"post\" accept-charset=\"GBK\">\n" +
    "  <input name=\"searchkey\" type=\"text\" value=\""+key+"\">\n" +
    "</form>\n" +
    "\n" +
    "</body>\n" +
    "<script>\n" +
    "  var form = document.getElementById('search');\n" +
    "  form.submit();\n" +
    "</script>\n" +
    "</html>";
var re=java.webView(html,getDomain()+"/blist","");
var base= java.base64Encode(re);
`data:;base64,${base},{"type":"qread"}`;

ruleBookInfo.init:
.bookbox,.tabsnav,.jianjie-popup@js:
bookUrl = String(java.getRedirectUrl())
book.setBookUrl(bookUrl)
let toc = java.getString('.more-btn@href');if(toc==''){let read = String(java.getString('.btn.0@href')).replace(/https?:\/\/.*?(?=\/)/).split('/');let len=read.length;if(len>3){if(/\d$/.test(read)){toc = bookUrl.replace(/\.[^\/]*$/,'/')}else{let tp=read[len-1].match(/\.[^.\/]+$/);java.put('path', '/'+read[1]+'/');java.put('tp', tp?tp[0]:'');toc = String(bookUrl).replace(/.html?$/,'.json')}}else{toc = read.join('/')}}java.put('toc',toc);tags=src.match(/tags\s*:\s*['"](.*)['"]/);if(tags&&tags[1]!='')java.put('tags','ğŸ· æ ‡ç­¾ï¼š'+tags[1].replace(/\|$/,'')+'\nğŸ“œ ç®€ä»‹ï¼š');result
ruleBookInfo.name: h1@text
ruleBookInfo.author: p.0@text
